description:
Juicy and succulent ham made from Austrlalian pork that's easy to carve and has been wood smoked for a richer flavour. Made in Australia by SunPork Fresh Foods who are owned and operated by three Australian families. 
Average weight of this product varies between 2.8KG - 3.2KG.Please note the price shown is calculated based on the maximum weight. 
This is a variable weight product and is priced by $/kg. Once we've picked your item in store, we'll refund you for the difference between the weight paid and the weight received. 
Make sure you utilise our pickers notes in the check out to add weight recommendations for our store pickers. We will try our best to provide you with the requested weight. 

Carving your Shoulder Ham:
Step 1: Place ham skin side up. Run a small sharp knife under the rind around the bottom (opposite end to hock) and each side of the ham to about halfway up. Peel the rind back. 
Step 2: Begin slicing from top to bottom straight through the ham, working your way back to the hock. 

Storing your Ham: 
Soak a clean ham bag, pillowcase or tea towel in 4 cups of water and 2 tablespoons of vinegar. 
Wring out excess water and place ham in the ham bag, pillowcase or wrap in the tea towel. Store in coolest part of the fridge. Re-soak bag in solution when ham bag dries out. 
Store at 1-5Â°C for up to a week.
name: Woolworths Semi Boneless Shoulder Ham 2.8KG - 3.2KG
